Promotional Messaging is a platform that helps businesses connect with their customers through SMS and MMS marketing. We provide tools to send text and multimedia messages, create campaigns, and track engagement, all in one easy-to-use platform.

Promotional Messaging stands out with: User-friendly campaign creation tools, Advanced analytics for tracking performance, Reliable compliance tools to meet legal regulations, Affordable pricing with flexible plans and Exceptional customer support

Our platform is versatile and supports a wide range of industries, including: Retail and e-commerce , Hospitality and restaurants , Healthcare and wellness , Education and non-profits , Real estate and event planning.

Your security is our top priority. Promotional Messaging uses robust encryption protocols to protect your data and complies with industry standards for privacy and security.

Why use promotional messages

Easy Control Panel

A user-friendly UI combined with a fully responsive design that makes it ideal for mobile devices.

7/24 Support

We are committed to offering top-notch client servers. You can contact us through our Facebook, Whatsapp or mobile number. Feel free to reach out to us.

Well Documented API

API are properly documented and easy to integrate with web/desktop or mobile systems.

High Delivery rate

It has been tested and guaranteed that 100% of the MMS deliveries are successful.

99.99% Uptime

Easy control panel with a user-friendly interface, fully customizable! Servers are filled with 4GB RAM and SSD in Linux Servers. So highly guarantee performance and uptime of our servers.

Reporting & Tools

You can create usage and delivery reports using the dashboard. Additionally, Send MMS offers, messages and MMS templates, Contact groups, and MMS scheduling.
